Articles.Content:
Hello everyone !

I would like to introduce you my model of the Mercury capsule I've made the last summer break. It's the kit from Atomic City & MRC, i think it's the best kit for a mercury I ever seen first because of the scale, 1/12 it's pretty big for a simple capsule. I've seen that Atomic city planned to make a 1/6 of the Mercury ! 

So there's some pictures of the "best".

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/cEz7a)

For the heatshield and escape-tower i've use a paintbrush and some black bomb-paint for the exterior of the Mercury and grey bomb for the interior ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You may have seen behind the Mercury i've already made model of the LM it's the model from Revel 1/100 and the giant Saturn V from Revel 1/400. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Maybe here there is some space modeler ?

Oh, that is so cool! Nice work! Gotta love the Mercury-Redstone.

When I was younger I made model airplanes with my father, then I discovered the internet. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Oh, that is so cool! Nice work! Gotta love the Mercury-Redstone.
> When I was younger I made model airplanes with my father, then I discovered the internet. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Oh the internet... It shows me all those wonderful models too expansive ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif) Thanks for the greatings mate ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This is certainly neat, I like all the details in the control panel (and in general). I have done some physical modeling, mostly scratch clay scifi models, and paper.

 More recently I have been getting into computer modeling, which is fun, but very different.
